name: Cartel Smash
description:
Single player tactical action game played in real time. The game is set in the realities of the 70's.

The player commands a small unit of commandos struggles with drug cartels hiding in the South American jungle, where a group of commandos, lead by a player has to execute a series of dificult missions on the enemy. Join the army and defeat the cartel.

Features.

-Multiple commandos with different skills.
-8 Missions filled with enemies and objectives.
-Unique stealth action gameplay.
